resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Two layers of the official python 3.6 windows image are not available for download.
Docker pull returns with unexpected status resolving reader: 403 Forbidden.

While this is a transient error, it blocks the release process.

See build log https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3967178530?check_suite_focus=true#step:8:368
fields.summary: [Packaging][Python] Disable windows wheel testing for python 3.6
